bilingual.source: The majority of people with Alzheimer's are 65 and above.
bilingual.target: 大多数患有阿尔茨海默病的人年龄在65岁及以上。

bilingual.source: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
bilingual.target: 每当你发现自己站在多数人一边时，是时候停下来反思了。

bilingual.source: A shocked Winton watched as the majority of people rose to their feet.
bilingual.target: 震惊的温顿看到大多数人站了起来。

bilingual.source: With the majority of attempts to climb Qomolangma resulting in success.
bilingual.target: 大多数攀登珠峰的尝试都取得了成功。

bilingual.source: The survey says that the majority of citizens are satisfied with the government's efforts to reduce smog.
bilingual.target: 调查显示，大多数市民对政府减少雾霾的努力感到满意。

bilingual.source: According to a recent survey, the majority of doctors believed their incomes did not match how hard they worked.
bilingual.target: 根据最近的一项调查，大多数医生认为他们的收入与他们的辛勤工作不相匹配。

bilingual.source: At age 18, instead of following the traditional path of marriage like the majority of girls, she chose to study medicine.
bilingual.target: 18岁时，她没有像大多数女孩那样走传统的婚姻道路，而是选择了学医。

bilingual.source: He spends the majority of his time working.
The majority of students passed the exam.
bilingual.target: 多数学生都通过了考试。

yingyinNormal.en: The blonde woman told me a few must be displaced so that the majority may thrive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 金发女人告诉我说少数人要被牺牲掉，多数人才能繁荣。

yingyinNormal.en: Not even Lyndon for a time, but he would've never become majority leader without him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 连林登(之后成为总统的林登·约翰逊)也曾站错队，但没有Russell，他也当不上多数党领袖。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a partner. You want to remove me, you need the majority vote of the executive board, and then you need a vote of the full board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是个合伙人，你想开除我，你需要执行委员会的多数票，然后你需要正式合伙人投票。

yingyinNormal.en: We understand that the vast majority of people in this country believe in stronger background checks, because they realize that we can uphold the Second Amendment, and also reduce the violence that is robbing us of our children.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们深知这个国家的多数公民都支持更加强有力的背景调查机制，因为他们意识到我们可以赞成第二修正案，并且减少让我们饱受丧子之痛的暴力事件。

yingyinNormal.en: A majority of Democrats and a majority of Republicans in both the House and the Senate have now approved a first, key part of our strategy by wide margins.
yingyinNormal.zh: 参众两院大多数民主党和共和党人都在广泛范围内支持这一战略的首要部分。

yingyinNormal.en: The reality is the vast majority of Colosseum students end up worse off than before they started.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真实的情况是大多数克鲁斯曼的学生在毕业后的生活反而比他们来上学之前更糟。

yingyinNormal.en: Recent surveys show that a majority of small business owners support a gradual increase to ten dollars and ten cents an hour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近的调查显示，大多数的小企业主都支持将工资标准逐步提高到每小时$10.10。

yingyinNormal.en: The majority of Americans only support anything if they don't have to face the fact of it. How the hamburger ended up on their plate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大多数美国人支持的事情都是那些他们自己不用面对的事，汉堡如何出现在他们的盘子里。

yingyinNormal.en: When the majority of the adjustable rates kick in, in '07, they will begin to fail. And if they fail above 15%, the whole bond is worthless.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等大多数浮动利率在07年开始执行时他们就会开始下跌，如果下跌超过15%，整个债券就一文不值了。

yingyinNormal.en: Because the majority of Americans only support abortion if they don't have to face the fact of it, if they don't have to hear the talk about where to squash...
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为大多数美国人支持堕胎只是因为他们不用直面这个问题，只是因为他们不用听到医生谈论要去挤压胎儿的哪里……

yingyinNormal.en: So since the majority of you are or will become sexually active at some point…
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，既然你们大部人现在或是总有一天会需求旺盛...

yingyinNormal.en: So I offer an alternative plan. A majority of four may approve it. No one may abstain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，我有另一套方案，四个人表决同意就能通过，不能投弃权票。

yingyinNormal.en: A recent survey shows that a majority of small business owners support a gradual increase to ten-ten an hour, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一项近期的调查显示大部分的小企业主也支持将工资标准逐步提高到每小时$10.10。

yingyinNormal.en: This magical moment is so critical that a majority of men and women have reported losing their attraction to someone after a bad first kiss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个神奇的时刻非常关键，以致于很多男人女人都说过，他们在糟糕的初吻经验后就对对方失去兴趣了。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 大多数；绝大多数；大部分

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Like the <highlight>majority</highlight> of authors, he had to suffer many disappointments and rejections along the way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像大多数作家一样，他在写作过程中不得不遭受许多失望和拒绝。

examination_example.sentence: Among the children who had not been tricked, the <highlight>majority</highlight> were willing to cooperate with the tester in learning a new skill.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在没有被戏弄的孩子中，大部分愿意与测试人员一起合作学习一项新技能。

examination_example.sentence: I think that, for the <highlight>majority</highlight> of scientific papers nowadays, statistical review is more essential than expert review.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为，对于当前大部分科研论文来说，统计审查比专家评审要更为关键。

word_usage.usage:
majority单独用作主语时，谓语动词多用单数形式，在强调“多数中的各个成员”时，谓语动词常用复数形式。例：
The majority was/were in favour of banning smoking.
大多数人支持禁烟。

the majority of后可用单数名词，也可用复数名词，谓语动词的数与of后面的名词相一致。例：
The majority of people around here are decent people. 
这里的大多数人都很正派。
The majority of the population is Protestant.
这里的人大多数都信奉新教。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 大多数；绝大多数；大部分

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 主要的；重大的；重要的；主要的；大部分的；大音阶的；大的；年长的

examination_example.sentence: It gives the <highlight>majority</highlight> of students ready access to their teachers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让大多数学生可以随时联系到他们的老师。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>majority</highlight> of managers seemingly just don't know any better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数管理者似乎不知道什么是更好的。

examination_example.sentence: It was a huge milestone in the development of smartphones, which are now owned by a <highlight>majority</highlight> of American adults.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是智能手机发展的一个重要里程碑，如今大多数美国成年人已经拥有智能手机。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the world's most climate-vulnerable countries, the <highlight>majority</highlight> of which are African or small island states, produce a very small quantity of emissions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界上许多最易受气候变化影响的国家，其中大多数是非洲或小岛屿国家，其实他们的温室气体排放量很少。

sense_info_list.en: the number by which the votes for one party or candidate exceed those of the next in rank

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 大多数；绝大多数；大部分

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 多数；大多数；成年；法定年龄；少校军衔；少校职位；多数党；多数派；领先票数；绝对多数

word_family.mean: adj. 主要的；重大的；重要的；主要的；大部分的；大音阶的；大的；年长的

examination_example.sentence: Although women make up the <highlight>majority</highlight> of undergraduates in our universities, just under half of academic staff are female.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然女性占我国大学本科生的大多数，但只有不到一半的教职员工是女性。

examination_example.sentence: Most importantly, it is against the law. So we will side with the <highlight>majority</highlight> of the people of Philadelphia who oppose this tax and take legal action to stop it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最重要的是，这项征税是违法的。因此，我们将站在反对这项征税的大多数费城人民一边，并采取法律行动来阻止它征税。

examination_example.sentence: According to the <highlight>majority</highlight> of Americans, women are every bit as capable of being good political leaders as men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据大多数美国人的说法，女性与男子一样，都有能力成为优秀的政治领袖。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The tasters generally taste tea with milk, since that is how the <highlight>majority</highlight> of British people drink their tea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 品尝者通常品尝加牛奶的茶，因为大多数英国人都是这样喝茶的。
